/data.description: A share where the OAuth token file exists, and email backups and logs will be stored.
/data.label: Data Storage

/etc/ssmtp/.description: A directory containing only a ssmtp config file to send email reports from the Docker container.
/etc/ssmtp/.label: SSMTP Configuration

GMVAULT_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: The email address of the account to back up.
GMVAULT_EMAIL_ADDRESS.label: GMVAULT_EMAIL_ADDRESS

GMVAULT_SEND_REPORTS_TO.description: The email address to send reports to; defaults to GMVAULT_EMAIL_ADDRESS.
GMVAULT_SEND_REPORTS_TO.label: GMVAULT_SEND_REPORTS_TO

GMVAULT_UID.description: Numeric uid in the host that should own created files; defaults to 9000.
GMVAULT_UID.label: GMVAULT_UID

GMVAULT_GID.description: Numeric gid in the host that should own created files; defaults to 9000.
GMVAULT_GID.label: GMVAULT_GID

GMVAULT_OPTIONS.description: Additional options to pass to gmvault (such as '-c no' for no deletions).
GMVAULT_OPTIONS.label: GMVAULT_OPTIONS

GMVAULT_QUICK_SYNC_SCHEDULE.description: Custom quick sync schedule; defaults to daily. (Cron format)
GMVAULT_QUICK_SYNC_SCHEDULE.label: GMVAULT_QUICK_SYNC_SCHEDULE

GMVAULT_FULL_SYNC_SCHEDULE.description: Custom full sync schedule; defaults to weekly. (Cron format)
GMVAULT_FULL_SYNC_SCHEDULE.label: GMVAULT_FULL_SYNC_SCHEDULE

GMVAULT_SYNC_ON_STARTUP.description: Set to `yes` to trigger a sync when the container starts, in addition to the normal cron schedule.
GMVAULT_SYNC_ON_STARTUP.label: GMVAULT_SYNC_ON_STARTUP

Gmvault.more_info: A Docker image that runs Gmvault on a regular basis, with both quick (daily) and full (weekly) synchronization schedules. Emails out sync reports through ssmtp.
